name: noncareer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a job or series of jobs that you do for only a short time, and does not lead to you getting better jobs: I had a noncareer in marketing. a non-career as a jazz drummer Related word
career
More examplesFewer examplesThis was the fiasco that launched my noncareer as a fashion model.
chosen for a job as a member or supporter of a political party or government, not because you always do this job and have experience or training in it: The president appointed several noncareer diplomats as ambassadors.
doing a particular job, often for a short time, that does not lead to you getting better jobs, or relating to a job like this: You may have to start off by taking a non-career job in a shop.
More examplesFewer examplesWe've had non-career ambassadors who did not speak the language at all.Non-career judges can be seen to be generally more open-minded.These noncareer firefighters are paid a modest $10 an hour for calls and are considered to be volunteers.
